<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Resize Instance</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/instances/{instance_id}/resize"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Change the size of the specified instance.
